sectionText: Advances in Rehb Technology:   This course has been designed for students who are interested in the use of technology to solve problems faced by people with disabilities. A review of current research and development in the fields of assistive devices and technologies will be covered. Students will be required to actively participate in discussions on how technology can help improve rehabilitative process and quality of life in people with disabilities. Hands-on experience on the development of a prototype assistive device (hardware or software) is included to strengthen students? research skills and problem solving abilities.
